== Description ==

Sticks a post by adding the post id into <code>sticky_posts</code> option in the options table.


== Usage ==

%%% <?php stick_post($post_id); ?> %%%

== Parameter ==
{{Parameter|$post_id|integer|Id if the post you want to stick}}

== Return Value ==
Function does not return any value

== Example ==

<pre>

$post_id = 1;
stick_post($post_id);

</pre>
